message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm aiming to sell it for around $20,000.  What are your thoughts?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me to consider, I understand you have a budget.  Could you do $17,000?  That would make it worthwhile for me.
I'm getting close to my budget, but $17,000 is still a bit steep. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
